statements: UPDATE Remote_Work_Resources SET resource_title = 'New Title', resource_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE resource_id = 1;
UPDATE Remote_Work_Resources SET category = 'Technology', resource_url = 'https://example.com/resource' WHERE resource_id = 2;

UPDATE Remote_Work_Resources SET resource_title = 'Work from Home Tips', resource_description = 'A comprehensive guide on working from home efficiently.', category = 'Productivity' WHERE resource_id = 1;
UPDATE Remote_Work_Resources SET category = 'Technology', resource_url = 'https://www.technews.com' WHERE resource_id = 2;
UPDATE best_practices SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE resources SET rating = 5, link = 'https://www.example.com/new-resource' WHERE title = 'New Resource';
UPDATE best_practices SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE resources SET rating = 5, title = 'Modified Title' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE best_practices SET description='Updated best practice description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE resources SET type='Video' WHERE resource_id=2;
UPDATE best_practices SET description='New description', category='New category' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE resources SET link='https://example.com', type='New type' WHERE resource_id=2;
UPDATE best_practices SET post_title='New Title 1', post_content='Updated Content 1' WHERE post_id=1;
UPDATE resources SET resource_description='Updated Description 2', resource_link='www.example.com' WHERE resource_id=5;
UPDATE best_practices SET post_title = 'New Title', post_content = 'Updated content' WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE resources SET resource_name = 'New Resource Name', resource_category = 'Updated Category' WHERE resource_id = 456;
UPDATE remote_work_best_practices SET title = 'Remote Work Security' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE remote_work_tools SET description = 'Collaboration tools for remote teams' WHERE category = 'Collaboration';
UPDATE remote_work_best_practices SET description = 'Updated best practices for remote work' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE remote_work_tools SET category = 'Collaboration' , description = 'A suite of tools for enhancing remote collaboration' WHERE name = 'RemoteTeam';
